services.name: EV Charger Installation

services.name: Electrical Inspections
services.description: Comprehensive electrical system inspections to identify safety issues and code violations. Get peace of mind knowing your home's electrical system is safe and up to standard.
services.hint: This could show inspection checklist and common issues found

services.name: Circuit Installation
services.description: New circuit installation for appliances, outlets, and high-power devices. We ensure proper load distribution and safe electrical connections throughout your home.
services.hint: This could explain different circuit types and installation process

about.heading: Trusted Local Electrician
paragraphs: PowerUp Electric has been serving homeowners with reliable electrical services for over 10 years. As a licensed and insured electrician, I specialize in helping families upgrade their electrical systems to meet modern demands.

I believe in doing the job right the first time, using quality materials and following all safety codes. Whether you're preparing for an electric vehicle or need to upgrade an old panel, I provide honest assessments and fair pricing on every project.
All work comes with a full warranty and is completed to exceed local electrical codes. I'm committed to keeping your family safe while providing the electrical capacity your modern home needs.
about.hint: This could show certifications, licenses, and customer testimonials
